settings.title: Discover a World of Fun & Learning this Summer!

settings.text: Two-week summer camps, taught by our instructors from Harvard, Yale, MIT, and more top universities

settings.testimonial:
My son told me this was the most fun he has had in the past 6 months! 

 I have never seen a group so capable, supportive, and passionate as you all are. Thank you for a great time!
settings.author: Lily Y.

settings.testimonial: Kids had the best week of camp! After just a week, her confidence is on another level!

settings.testimonial: My son told me this was the most fun he has had in the past 6 months!

settings.testimonial: My child really loves your programs. Again, thank you for giving us this opportunity.

settings.subtitle: INNOVATIVE
settings.title: Instructors
settings.text: We select experienced instructors from top institutions such as Harvard, Yale, MIT, Princeton, & more! All of our instructors are trained by educational professionals on our curriculum team with years of experience in effective instruction. Our instructors strive to cultivate a love of learning in all students, and work hard to meet the individual educational goals of each student.

settings.subtitle: Non-traditional Summer camps
settings.title: Inspiring Students
settings.text:
Through innovative instruction and hands-on projects, all of our summer camps are designed to develop real-world skills for our students (all while having fun)!

Covering subjects such as Public Speaking, Video Games, Physics-based Problem Solving, Acting, YouTube Video Creation, and much more, we provide an interesting camp for every kind of learner!

settings.title: How do I find my camp link? / What platform do you use for online programming?
settings.text: We use the Zoom platform to connect with students from all around the world! Your Zoom link will be emailed to prior to the beginning of your course. You can email info@ivycamps.org at any time if you need any assistance.

settings.title: Are parents allowed to join students?
settings.text: Parents are allowed to sit in on courses, but it's not required. You can trust that our expert Program Leads will keep your children active and engaged during the duration of the entire course.

settings.title: How is your curriculum developed and who is it developed by?
settings.text: Our Curriculum Development Specialists have decades of experience in grade-school education and summer programming. They perform very thorough research and update the curriculum every semester to reflect the latest innovations in education.
